name: Lost Flagship (demo, re-uploaded)
description:
You’re a captain of one of the biggest starships ever made, a great Flagship of Earth… of the past. Now your ship is a “flying museum”. Days of great glory are gone, and your crew is bringing you coffee and eating dust. But one day strange accident brought you to an unknown place, a strange galaxy. You found yourself in the middle of Great War between… um, humans and humans?! 


Where did they came from in non-explored sectors?!You’re a captain of one of the biggest starships ever made, a great Flagship of Earth… of the past. Now your ship is a “flying museum”. Days of great glory are gone, and your crew is bringing you coffee and eating dust. But one day strange accident brought you to an unknown place, a strange galaxy. You found yourself in the middle of Great War between… um, humans and humans?! Where did they come from in non-explored sectors?!

You’re alone - no support fleet, no great armadas of star destroyers and great cannons. All you’ve still got is your guts and honor. Build an unstoppable army from scratch, turn the tides of war, solve the mistery of hidden civilizations, and… return home, at last.
